abstract: Chambers Bay Golf Course in Washington State, links-style golf course that has only one tree, a nearby freight line and type of grass more common in Britain, is set to host 2015 United States Open--its first in Pacific Northwest.
lead_paragraph: Chambers Bay Golf Course, which was completed in 2007 with the Open in mind, has three defining features that will set the tournament apart from its predecessors.

headline.main: From Tree to Greens, a U.S. Open Unlike Any Before
headline.print_headline: From Tree to Green, an Open All Its Own

snippet: Chambers Bay Golf Course, which was completed in 2007 with the Open in mind, has three defining features that will set the tournament apart from its predecessors.

keywords.value: Chambers Bay Golf Course (University Place, Wash)
